website_summaries.verdict: This serum is effective for reducing both active acne and scars from past breakouts.
pros: Reduces the look of scars without drying skin
Made with a powerful blend of natural ingredients that goes below the epidermal barrier
No fragrances, benzoyl peroxide, hydroquinone, petrolatum, retinol, sulfate, or gluten
cons: May dry the skin a bit

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by a co worker. I guess she could see I was trying to conceal my very large breakouts. I'm in my 50's (don't laugh, acne doesn't always go away). This was actually $10 cheaper than the website (risky on amazon, I Know!) But within 2 days, 4 applications, I started to see a very noticeable difference. Healing and much reduction in irritation. feels great on my skin! I actually ordered the 3 piece travel set so I could try the other 2 products. My skin is irritated if I travel and use different water, so the fact that this worked quickly holds promise!
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Mom

customer_reviews.title: Works Wonders
customer_reviews.text: I initially received a sample of this in my Birchbox and was pleased to find it on Amazon for a great price (compared to other online vendors). I’ve been using this serum regularly for about 5 months now. And since using this serum I’ve had noticeably clearer skin with virtually no cystic acne breakouts. I’m also able to confidently leave the house with little to no makeup which I wouldn’t have done a year ago! This product truly has changed my life. I just can’t say enough good things about it. I just wish it came in a larger size. I’d highly recommend giving this a try!
customer_reviews.author: jh050914

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: I found this serum by way of happy accident. I received a sample in a beauty box subscription. After using it a few times, I was hooked. My skin care routine is not complete without it! While I've tried the cleanser and moisturizer that go with, I really love the serum. I am plagued by adult acne, thanks to medications, and this serum not only helps to lessen the duration of the acne, but it clears up the scarring and redness beautifully! I love this stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders without irritation...
customer_reviews.text: Works amazingly well on all members of the family. Dab this stuff on a pimple and it will be gone in the morning. I have never had an acne product work this well, it takes care of my occasional adult acne, and works wonders for my teen and pre teen daughters. Evologie also has a 3 step system we purchased for my 15 year old after we had such luck with the blemish serum, and it has completely cleared her sensitive skin with no issues with irritation. 10/10, I've purchased this many times and I now have it set for auto refills. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for me
customer_reviews.text: Does not prevent new breakouts and does not clear up existing blemishes. Blemishes are taking longer than normal to heal when I use as a spot treatment...and when I use it all over my skin, it does not prevent new breakouts. For the price, I was expecting it to be more effective. I think that its perhaps just not a match for my skin type because many people seem to love it. Perhaps I need something stronger, I usually use 2% salicylic acid.
customer_reviews.author: Sfbrock79

customer_reviews.title: Great for problematic skin
customer_reviews.text: I am 28 year old male, I have breakouts here and there. I was recommended this product it is my regular goto product for my face . I use it after I shower and It’s to hold off almost all break outs. If you do spot a pimple and act fast with this serum the redness and size will reduce. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell B.

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Serum
customer_reviews.text: I have never reviewed a product on amazon or any other website before, but I had to speak out for this product. It is liquid gold! I have fair skin and any blemish I have creates a scar even if I don’t pop it. I got this and figured I would give it a go. I was so pleasantly surprised when I saw my scars fading after only two days. My skin has never looked so beautiful and healthy. I apply twice a day as the directions say and it is really working wonders!
customer_reviews.author: Hmorse

customer_reviews.title: Great on the inside, but where is it all?
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this product, but why so much wasteful and misleading packaging????? For such a small amount, I feel like I'm paying for the packaging with the amount of a travel-sized sample inside vs the actual product. Really frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Hopler-Doppler

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: Believe this is my third purchase in two years. I don’t break out often, but when I do, this stuff is beyond incredible. Doesn’t dry out my skin and significantly reduces the amount of time a blemish remains. I also use it as a preventative measure at a certain point in the month. ;) Just dab a little in the most likely break out spots and that typically prevents any from appearing. Couldn’t recommend this product more!! It’s an absolute must in my skin care arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole G

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!!! I received a trial size of Evologie Intensive Blemish Serum in an ipsy bag awhile back and fell in love with this product. It works wonders on acne and keeping my face acne clear. I had scaring on my face from shingles and this serum has lightened the scar to where it's not even noticeable. I use it every night before going to bed and every morning before putting my makeup on. This is the one product I make sure to never run out of!!
customer_reviews.author: Janie Hoover

customer_reviews.title: This is GREAT for people with stubborn acne that have tried it all!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this Intensive Blemish Acne Serum. I use it religiously. I've had acne for over 14 years and have been to several dermatologists. I've been prescribed everything including: pills, topical creams, and face washes. Nothing worked (or at least barely worked). I got this in my BirchBox one month and it's changed my life. I rarely get acne now. If I do, I put this on and it severely limits how bad the pimples get. I have terrible cystic acne that is so painful and obnoxious looking; but with this product it makes it 100X better. LOVE IT. I've had the clearest skin (that I've ever had since the age of 16) since using this product. Highly endorse!
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Causes acne, use with caution.
customer_reviews.text: For it undisputedly caused breakouts. I’ve used salicylic acid products for years to manage occasional blemishes; never have I had such a bad reaction! I could not recommend this product and I would caution anyone against using it.
customer_reviews.author: Joel B.

customer_reviews.title: The only thing that cures my breakouts!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for YEARS and it is truly the only product that clears up my breakouts. I now use it nightly (even tho it is quote pricey) to prevent future breakouts and fade acne scars. The bottle/website says it will fade scarring, but I haven't been using it nightly for long enough to say whether that is happening. I will say that I haven't broken out since using it nightly. I've used tea tree oil alone for breakouts but it does not work nearly as well as the Evologie serum!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous for Adult Acne
customer_reviews.text: I had received the Evologia Intensive Blemish in a bag I pay for monthly. I used the the sample for 5-6 days and loved it. I bought Evologie from Amazon and I use it twice a day and my face looks so much better. I am in my late 50’s and I started getting a bit of adult acne. This product is fabulous and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: SuzeeQ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I am shocked at how well this serum works. I have had it less than a week and this is the clearest my skin has ever been. It even shrank a cystic bump! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Definitely great for spot acne treatment. I have a bad t-zone and use it on that and other random zits I get and it keeps it under control. Best stuff. Doesn't dry out my skin at all. I have very sensitive skin, doesn't burn or irritate at all. I've had over the counter lotions burn my skin and this doesn't. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: HanSch

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: At 54, I suddenly started having hormonal breakouts on my chin. I’m an esthetician, so this is not a good look. After trying all kinds of topicals, Evologie is the ONLY one to help! Thank goodness. It’s a bit pricey for the size.
customer_reviews.author: ms.r

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: Gets rid of zits better than any of the other products I have bought from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Don’t believe the hype!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure how some have been using for years. It’s fairly new if you did some research. This product did not even make dent in what it promises or from other peoples review! Describe as greatest miracle, only to fall for it so people can buy! I’m sorry, but I’ve tried 2 weeks straight and did get any results and made it even worse.
customer_reviews.author: Topper_310

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you have Rosacea, subtype 2 :(
customer_reviews.text: Made my Rosacea subtype 2 worse, even after using the entire bottle. No azaleic acid in this bunch, or my skin would have been flawless. Now it looks worse than when I started.
customer_reviews.author: Jillmunkie

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t the miracle cure we hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this didn’t help my daughters acne. We’re always looking for a miracle cure but this wasn’t it. She thinks it may have even made her skin worse, and she used it until it ran out, almost a month.
customer_reviews.author: Jake's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Works on teen acne - worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Two of my kids had acne when they reached puberty. With only one application, the acne started to decrease. With daily use, it goes away completely. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited to have found this product! It’s perfect for my skin and prevents break outs. It does not dry out my skin like most products I’ve used. My skin is very sensitive to any changes and This gentle serum works like magic. LOVE this product! it is a great find.
customer_reviews.author: Darina juykova

customer_reviews.title: %14 azelaic acid sinks in so you can layer products on top
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a product with azelaic acid for anti aging and brightening to add to my k beauty routine. I wish I didn't like this so much! It's pricey to use all over my face but it works like nothing else. I use many products and this is the one thing I notice immediately when I stop. It is the only non prescription azelaic acid at %14! It sinks in so quickly and I can layer on all my other products with no problem. I have been using it for almost a year before writing this review. I will never be with out it.
customer_reviews.author: kristin a barnett

customer_reviews.title: For me personally
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: regardless of it not seeming to work, I saw it through, and my skin is now getting clearer!! I used this from Birchbox, and I was pretty confident it was working, so I went ahead and purchased the full bottle. I'm sad to report that I've still had my breakouts. It doesnt mean that this product won't work for you! My next step is seeing my dermatologist for this new found acne problem.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Try out the trial size and stick with it, cleared my skin up!
customer_reviews.text: It takes some time for this product to start working, but once it does your skin will be happy. I have oily skin, so I didn't deal with any drying aspects that some other people might have. I have bought it a number of times and have a subscription to save money. Just be sure to try the trial size before you commit, best way to make sure your skin doesn't have any issues. Their customer service is great if you do.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous12345

customer_reviews.title: sometimes it works great, and maybe its my stress level counteracting its ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is odd, sometimes it works great, and maybe its my stress level counteracting its ability to reduce blemishes and redness. I can tell that acne scars on my face are visibly better since I began using it. It doesn't seem to do much for my active, red/inflamed acne or cystic acne. Redness does appear to go down. It always kind of leaves a film on my face, though. Would recommend to a friend but probably won't buy again for myself. Its definitely skin-type to skin-type preferences.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A Graham

customer_reviews.title: Finally Something That Works
customer_reviews.text: I’ve gone through so many products trying to find something that will actually help fight my acne, and keep it gone. Let me tell you this is the product. I saw some other reviews, and I decided to give myself the go-ahead. I’ve never have had such a fast acting acne remover. I didn’t want to try curology because it just seemed overpriced, but this is just worth every single dollar.
customer_reviews.author: Austin N.

customer_reviews.title: Life-changing.
customer_reviews.text: After three decades of breakouts and sensitive skin, I am FINALLY blemish-free. I don’t know what I will do if this product is ever discontinued! I’ve used numerous prescription topicals in the past that don’t work as well as this. It doesn’t dry out my skin. My skincare regimen is now simple: Twice a day I cleanse with Cetaphil Oil-Control Foam Wash, followed by a thin layer of this product. At night I finish with Avene Trixera Balm. That’s it. All I can say is THANK YOU!!! Words can’t begin to describe my gratitude!
customer_reviews.author: Twinmama

customer_reviews.title: Fights blemishes without overdrying
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I'm in my late 30s, and have the occasional blemish (especially during pregnancy!). The products I had used for years either dried-out my skin or were not to be used during pregnancy. I tried Evologie and it worked well on my blemishes without making my skin dry and flakey. Totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: JoeyC

customer_reviews.title: You need this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I tried it once and had to order more once I ran out. I have super acne prone skin and this clears my face up. I put it on every day even under my make up.
customer_reviews.author: Becky U

customer_reviews.title: Pimple
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this product. The day I put this on i got more pimples.
customer_reviews.author: IVANKA

customer_reviews.title: ... of this product for me and I am very happy with the results
customer_reviews.text: So this is the first-time purchase of this product for me and I am very happy with the results. I have been in a rut and have had a bad couple of areas with breakout that have been very difficult to get under control. Not exaggerating - I noticed a change after the first application. Very pleased with the results. Would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: AP Chicago

customer_reviews.title: My skin looks and feels amazing! If I do have a breakout
customer_reviews.text: This is my third order of the Evologie serum. I've struggled with acne most of my life and have tried just about everything. I've recently tried to take a more natural approach with the products I'm using. I use Just Natural to cleanse my skin and Evologie serum for spots. My skin looks and feels amazing! If I do have a breakout, I use the serum after cleansing and I can see a visible difference in just a few hours. And my skin feels soothed instead of that burning feeling you get from most acne meds. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Forbes

customer_reviews.title: Thank you magical skin wizards!
customer_reviews.text: I first tried this serum in a sample from birchbox. It did incredible things for the little breakouts I had. Then I got a job managing a dominos and began breaking really bad on my lower cheek and neck. Gnarly whiteheads that were red. I rmebered how Mich I lived this stuff. Unfortunately I forgot to take a before picture, because no joke it cleared up I'm two days. There is still marks but I'm sure they will be gone by day 7 or 10. I am blown away. It doesn't dry uut your skin and sucks the sebum right out. Thank you magical skin wizards. I feel beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Briana T.

customer_reviews.title: As a woman over 40 I have found that my ...
customer_reviews.text: As a woman over 40 I have found that my skin sometimes wants to relive its teenage years with a few random outbreaks of acne. I find that this serum is gentle enough to use every day but also helps my skin look clear and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Sara S.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled with adult (cystic) acne which has resulted in some scarring. I LOVE this product! It has kept my acne at bay and has made a significant improvement on the scarring. I will continue to use this product as I haven't round many that actually work for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Blemish Serum out there!
customer_reviews.text: Evologie is the first product that has decreased my blemishes substantially. If I notice a pimple coming in I put the serum on right away and by the next day the pimple is gone. I now apply it everyday to my problem areas to avoid breakouts and it works! My skin feels and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for about a month now and its definitely reducing the redness.
customer_reviews.author: Chef J.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for adult acne.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for adult acne. I use this product every day and have great results. I have tried pretty everything out there but this REALLY WORKS.
customer_reviews.author: Cch

customer_reviews.title: Clears blemishes, acne, and redness
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Clears redness, clears acne in 1-3 days, doesn't dry skin, prevents new acne from forming, clears old scaring. Cons: None
customer_reviews.author: Atiras1

customer_reviews.title: and it worked so great, I purchased this on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I originally received a sample of this in my ipsy bag, and it worked so great, I purchased this on Amazon. It really helps with keeping blemishes from getting worse, and keeping inflammation down. Many blemish creams end up drying out my skin too much, but this serum clears up blemishes without over-drying, and is very gentle on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Acne free for the first time!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a life saver! I’m acne free for the first time since I can remember. I had tried every possible acne wash out there - including proactiv and some very expensive brands with no luck. I finally stumbled upon this and haven’t had an issue with my acne since! It’s serioulsy amazing and I’m so thankful to have finally found something to fix my adult acne.
customer_reviews.author: ellekay

customer_reviews.title: Best Acne product I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many products and face washes and nothing ever really seemed to work for my stubborn acne. Since I've started using this my face has cleared up like never before. This stuff has been a miracle for my skin!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Mosley

customer_reviews.title: Love it! It’s so nice on my skin and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It’s so nice on my skin and gives me instant results! Though I do have to say I can’t use it after one of my face washes because I get this tingling sensation when I put it on but other then that I’m really satisfied. It really works and is really worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Pen

customer_reviews.title: MORE BREAKOUTS
customer_reviews.text: Usually my skin likes Sal Acid and works well to it however it made me breakout more and didn't help my existing acne either. For the price its quite pricey because the bottle is very small and you use it morning and night.
customer_reviews.author: Vi

customer_reviews.title: No a miracle worker on your skin
customer_reviews.text: I started breaking out a little don't know if I put to much on. Haven't seen anything amazing happen to my skin.
customer_reviews.author: April neilson Didn't get the Emory boards

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Blemishes are ready to disappear overnight! I just love how it works!!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Miller

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample of this in the mail and ever since then I have been using it daily. I'm 37 years old and nothing in my life has ever worked like this to clear up my face. I can now go without foundation.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great product for those deep or big acne blemishes
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to "zap away" a problem blemish. I have bought the kits in the past. But, this is the product that I really need to keep on hand. It is great for sensitive skin, gentle while effective.
customer_reviews.author: patc

customer_reviews.title: Gave it a chance.
customer_reviews.text: Didnt go well for my skin. ThT’s just my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years and I love it!!!! beyond happy with the consistency. its light and not oily. its a perfect serum for all types of skin :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works! Doesn’t irritate!
customer_reviews.text: I have rosacea and it is hard to find a product that helps with breakouts without irritating my skin. This serum is a great on the spot treatment that eliminates blemishes quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great job clearing acne scars
customer_reviews.text: Is my complexion perfect now that I've started using this cream? No. But is it a whole lot better? YES. The acne scars I previously had are almost gone after a month of using the serum, and the acne that I still get is smaller and goes away faster than it did before. If you're looking for a good acne product without going to the dermatologist, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing!!! It worked from the first use and I have had clear skin since using this product.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Good feeling on the skin
customer_reviews.text: good texture, fresh feeling on the skin, use it for a few months and improve only a little the appearance of the spots
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Aragon

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it makes my skin feel clean And I love the scent
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Has worked well.
customer_reviews.text: I had tried a sample from IPSY and liked it. Unfortunately, when I received this, my face was going thru a bout of cystic acne due to a new medication. It helped but I would like to re-evaluate after my face calms down.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Havens

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for blemishes and stubborn acne and works fast. I’ve tried many other brands but this works the best. First received a sample from Sephora and was very impressed on how quickly it works!
customer_reviews.author: Carmela DiGrado

customer_reviews.title: Something finally worked!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many products for the past two years for my hormonal acne, and this is the only product that works. I received this as a sample in a beauty box and am so happy and grateful I did. I use this prior to putting on makeup over blemishes and at night after washing. A thin layer is all that is needed and is like magic- I wake up and the blemishes are gone.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample of this in my ipsy bag and I loved it so I purchased it on amazon and it's just as great! My blemishes don't last as long as it use to and they're easier to get rid of. Will most definitely be purchasing it again in the future
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Jaijairam

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing It cleared my skin so quickly without over drying it. I recommend this to anyone Who struggles with struggling with acne.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Love love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love love this stuff! This works better than the junk dermatologist prescribed and less expensive. It makes blemishes almost disappear overnight. This was my 3rd bottle and even set up subscription on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: CAMM Bam

customer_reviews.title: Great blemish serum
customer_reviews.text: This serum works wonderfully. Both of my teenagers use it, and I have used it myself a few times. We do apply a little more than what is suggested, and blemishes disappear within a day or so.
customer_reviews.author: Jovi Fan

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for about a week and a half. It’s helped when new zits pop up. The redness has gone down. Hopefully will see better results on my acne scars after a month or two of use.
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: Love this product so much
customer_reviews.text: Subscribed! Bought for the third time. Absolutely love this product. Mainly use it for little blemishes- and once a month I use it for my whole face. I use it after waking up and washing my face as well as before bed :)
customer_reviews.author: Siana

customer_reviews.title: Magic in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this is unbelievably the best product I’ve used for fast acne scar/spot removal In almost three days I began to see total improvement! Deff recommend! It’s expensive in my opinion but it works like magic so absolutely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Aracely Cruz

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really does work
customer_reviews.text: Honestly can't say enough good thing about this product. Definitely worth the price.

customer_reviews.title: amazing!
customer_reviews.text: this product is the only one that works on my face as a teenager with hormonal acne
customer_reviews.author: forrest j.

customer_reviews.title: Acne under control
customer_reviews.text: I was on medication for my acne because I couldn’t get it under control, but now I have the control with the help of Evologie Intensive Blemish Serum! I have tried so many products for my face and nothing seemed to work and I feel like I gave up. But I found this and Im so happy I ordered it!
customer_reviews.author: Katie b.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It has not worked for my daughter and in fact she has had an allergic reaction to it
customer_reviews.author: maria wood

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what kind of magic Evologie puts in this ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what kind of magic Evologie puts in this product, but it's the only thing that truly clears up my stress breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. Works great without drying out my skin and bleaching my sheets. I just reordered more.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: MAY WORK FOR SOME, BUT NOT ME (UNFORTUNATELY)
customer_reviews.text: This serum was recommended to me to help clear blemishes from moderate adult acne. The one who advised I try it said it works GREAT for her. Unfortunately, I haven't gotten the same results. Of course, everyone's skin in different. I have moved on to another product. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Full size product
customer_reviews.text: I started using this from a sample from Birchbox and Amazon has a better price point from this seller than Birchbox. Works great for breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this treatment for almost a month twice a day and there is no difference in my cystic prone skin. Very disappointed especially since it was so expensive and had good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaves your skin soo smooth!
customer_reviews.text: I received a sample of this product from a hotel and very happy it was offered on Amazon. It makes your skin feel smooth & non drying!
customer_reviews.author: DP Reader

customer_reviews.title: Kinda pricey for the number of uses which is why I probably won't buy again no matter how good it may (or may not) work in the l
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well but hard to say because the bottle is so small and only lasts a few weeks. Kinda pricey for the number of uses which is why I probably won't buy again no matter how good it may (or may not) work in the long term.
customer_reviews.author: Leah P. Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried numerous acne and blemish products and finally found something that really works! It not only quickly heals new acne, but works wonders on getting rid of old acne scars in less than a week! Love this stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: Lora D.

customer_reviews.title: Best product on the martlet if it’s kind
customer_reviews.text: Everyone that deals with acne prone/ oily skin should own this product
customer_reviews.author: Shalonda Battee

customer_reviews.title: Songlad I found this!
customer_reviews.text: Best serum I have used on my tricky complexion...hands down. I have used expensive prescription stuff and OTC stuff but Evologie seems to do the trick. Received my order In a timely fashion and am 100% satisfied. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Rickee  Moss (rickee1368@aol.com)

customer_reviews.title: Works great and I would recommend to anyone who wants a gentle skin cleanser.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is pure and clean and gentle and always leaves my skin feeling thoroughly cleansed , no harshness. I also buy it for my young granddaughter and she loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Rose

customer_reviews.title: Prevent and manage breakouts
customer_reviews.text: This product is a perfect blemish manager. If I start to have a breakout I simply apply before bed and by morning everything is calm. I use it to prevent breakouts on those sensitive areas of my face.
customer_reviews.author: Zoeyzoolander

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: A nice blemish serum for people with sensitive skin. In the summer, I have been using in tandem with a salicylic acid gel. However, it is non-drying and I will likely use it by itself during the winter months.
customer_reviews.author: GojiGyrl

customer_reviews.title: How the product made me feel..
customer_reviews.text: I don't like it because it dried my skin out. It left it feeling very tight and dry. Also, I didn't feel like my face got very clean..
customer_reviews.author: Judy Pitman-Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: This is the best blemish fighter I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best blemish fighter I have ever used. It is great on teen acne as well as hormone -induced blemishes you get later in life. It not only clears them quickly, but lightens them, too. I always have it at home and in my travel bag.
customer_reviews.author: Karen K

customer_reviews.title: These don't work really well for me. They are ...
customer_reviews.text: These don't work really well for me. They are ok, but nothing too special for my face. Well, at least they don't dry my face out and seem to work on smaller blemish.
customer_reviews.author: CoolieDude

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work fantastically
customer_reviews.text: So far, very good! I've never had acne issues in my life (I'm 31) but over the past six months have had pesky outbreaks on my chin that just didn't seem to stop. I have been using this serum for less than a week and already see results -- the existing outbreak stopped, the scars are starting to clear up, and no new outbreaks out started yet. Definitely a fan!
customer_reviews.author: JFY180

customer_reviews.title: No noticeable change
customer_reviews.text: After few weeks of use, no noticeable changes to acne. I'm wondering if the effects will only be shown if I also use the CREAM as stated in the directions... I have side acne (that look like acne scars) that I have been trying to reduce for a few months now but nothing has changed. Overall disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’m Audrey Barone and I’m the one using these products ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m Audrey Barone and I’m the one using these products, not John. They work very well...the skin cleanser keeps my face smooth and the intensive blemish serum keeps the rosacea acne on my nose in check. It’s been clear since I’ve been using it last summer.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My face loves this stuff. My breakouts are much less and more skin tone is looking the best it’s ever looked. I just wish the moisturizer came in a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Pennywise

customer_reviews.title: Clear skin!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Had terrible break out & cleared so quickly with this serum!! Our 2nd time buying this!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Great product indeed
customer_reviews.text: It"s been only a week I started using this Evologie cream and i look very different. Great product indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this product
customer_reviews.text: BEST. BLEMISH. SERUM. EVER!!! I received a sample in my ipsy bag or birchbox (can't remember)...Anyway, when it was gone I had to have more!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have tried EVERYTHING to clear up my face and seen multiple dermatologists who can never offer anything more than an expensive prescription that doesn't work. The morning after I used this product I noticed a difference. My skin is the clearest it's EVER been after using this for 3 weeks. It's worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product...skin is great since using it... however the dispenser is not as efficient as I expected - once u get to the end of it is difficult to get all the product out and so quite a bit gets wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have, just be careful with the pump
customer_reviews.text: Works great! The pump does seem to dispense a ton easily, but the product is kinda of like that. I would recommend not even using a full pump when you want to spot treat, just do like quarter or half pumps. Either way, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Bearika

customer_reviews.title: Miracle in a bottle!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It's the only thing that controls my cystic acne!
customer_reviews.author: V. Ewart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing and helps my acne so much!
customer_reviews.author: sandramarie

customer_reviews.title: This really worked!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as it has the active ingredient in a prescription that the insurance barely covered. It really seemed to help the rash disappear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: evologie Intensive Blemish Serum | Helps Clear Acne, Dark Spots & Scars | Non-Drying, Hypoallergenic, Natural Ingredients | 0.5 Fl. Oz
feature_bullets: Intensive Blemish Serum: The best blemish treatment to rapidly banish visible blemishes, discoloration and surface scars without irritating or drying your skin. The doctor-developed formula penetrates the skin, going straight to the source to eliminate trapped bacteria, dirt, and oil, delivering natural skin-repairing ingredients and intense hydrators where needed most for blemish control.

The Blemish Control Problem: The best acne treatments rely on high concentrations of ingredients like benzoyl peroxide to dry up pimples quickly. This can irritate your skin increasing oil production, clog pores, cause inflammation and micro cracks. As a result, bacteria can penetrate skin’s surface, causing acne and pimples to return.

The Blemish Treatment Solution: Intensive Blemish SERUM blemish treatment is the perfect blend of natural ingredients to clear visible blemishes and hydrate skin. It effectively strengthens your skin’s natural protective barrier, reducing the occurrence of future breakouts without benzoyl peroxide, dryness or irritation.

The evologie Difference: A powerful combination of intense hydrators, protective antioxidants and essential amino acids to keep moisture in, and blemishes out. Helps skin’s natural ability to correct, protect and strengthen itself to produce clear, healthy, long-lasting results. Skin looks clear, stays clear without dryness, irritation—or complications. At the heart of our pioneering technology is the power of hydration
Natural & Honest: The artificial fragrance free, parabens free, formaldehyde free, sulfate free, articial color free and cruelty free evologe products are made in the U.S.A
